answers.answer: You description makes me think of hyperawareness of entopic phenomena especially the blue field effect or flying corpusles.JCH MD

question: I have been seeing silver, white, and clear cirles for several days now; sometimes there are so many that I can hardly see.  They seem to lessen when I rest or are less in the morning. What are they and why do the appear?  They have been constantly there for several days now.  What can I do about them, can I get rid of them?I am a 55 years old African American female.  I have seven children, ages 22-33, one miscarriage over 25 years ago.  I weight about 150 pounds.  I work at my weight all the time. I was diagnosed with diabetes in 1995, then I weighed 185 lbs..   I have never taken any medicine for diabetes and for the last 3 years I haven't seen a doctor since we no longer have any health insurance.  For the past fifteen months or so my diabetes seemed to be getting out of my control.  I started having funny pain and sensation in my arms, legs, heels of my feet, my lower back, my neck, my chest (with a burning sensations as well); which all seem to be worsening.  My youngest son was very ill for about 6 months-(he is doing better now) and I didn't do so well taking care of myself.  Things are better now and I can pay more attention to myself.In January I decided to stop eating meat.  I eat much more nuts--several types and in February I added cheese.  I mostly eat fruit and vegetables.  Yesterday I ate some Lamb that I fixed my family for Easter, this was a real first for any amount of meat in over 3 months, then later in the day my vision seemed to clear up unlike it had in days.  Could the meat have made those circles go away?  Please HELP!  I do not want those circles to ever return!!!  Thanks in advance!
title: My eyes are seeing silver, white, clear circles.
